net.sourceforge.jnipp.project
Class ProxyGenSettings

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.ProxyGenSettings
public class ProxyGenSettings
extends java.lang.Object

Class for manipulating Proxy Generator settings. Each instance of this class contains data utilized to specify and query settings controlling the manner in which the C++ Proxy Generator is run. Each Project instance contains zero or one ProxyGenSettings instance.

Version:
$Revision: 1.21 $
Author:
$Author: ptrewhella $
See Also:
net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.Project#proxyGenSettings

initialize

private void initialize(org.w3c.dom.Element elementNode)
                 throws org.w3c.dom.DOMException,
                        ProjectFormatException
Public class instance initializer. The initialize() method is called to initialize the settings for this ProxyGenSettings instance using the elements contained in the supplied Element parameter. This method is called from the constructor.
Parameters:
elementNode - The Element containing the elements that specify the settings for the Proxy Generator.

getDOMNode

public org.w3c.dom.Node getDOMNode(org.w3c.dom.Document targetDoc)
Method for retrieving the equivalent DOM node representation of the Proxy Generator settings. This method is utilized by the Project class as part of its getDOMNode() method to serialize the Proxy Generator settings, along with all of its child settings.
Parameters:
targetDoc - The target Document instance.
Returns:
The DOM Node representation of the settings.
